thread.title: Fellowship at the feet of Christ / Christian Science Sentinel
thread.title_full: Fellowship at the feet of Christ / Christian Science Sentinel

author: Joni Overton-Jung
title: Fellowship at the feet of Christ / Christian Science Sentinel
text: Are you sure? This bookmark will be removed from all folders and any saved notes will be permanently removed. Poem March 29, 2024 Fellowship at the feet of Christ Joni Overton-Jung i will come to the feet of Christ i will come to this fount i will come to this holy ground to be washed and cleaned to be blanketed in Love’s light to be clothed in my right mind to be born again to rise up anew to find myself as the apple of Love’s eye still and before and for always this is the new birth of never “not here” never “not daughter” of the Most High never “not sistered” in Your holy presence never “not kin” to Your Christ aloved in light familied forever in Immanuel, “God with us” Enjoy 1 free Sentinel article or audio program each month, including content from 1898 to today.
